entry.summary: RTâ€‚Fire Bryan Pellegrino of @LayerZero_Labs Twitter has been compromised and has scam links on it that will steal your assets. Confirmed with Fire below. Don't click any links other than accounts you absolutely trust and make sure to have Fire installed!
